about_the_game:
Star Bind is an action rogue-lite that puts you in the role of Lazlo, an intergalactic scientist trying to survive an unknown threat. Combine different equipment and stars during the game to survive the constant battles with your enemies.

Stars

They are your combat partner in the game, and they have a wide variety of skills that will unlock as you defeat more enemies, making them more effective and unique. Each time you die, you'll use your collected stardust to upgrade you and your Star at the Starforge.

Guns... Lots of guns!

There are a lot of weapons to find, each with one of the five unique gun styles and countless possibilities with its attributes and modifiers generator.

Consumables

Items with limited uses that need refilling. Knowing when and how to use it can be crucial for success, creating favorable scenarios even in seemingly hopeless situations.

Elemental Interactions

Weapons, consumables, and Star Skills are all associated with one of the seven elements in the game. By combining these elements, you can create potent reactions that can shift the tide of combat in your favor.
